original_title: Sri Lanka sells 2027 bonds, 2025 bids rejected
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka sold all offered 20 billion rupees of the 2027 billion bond, but rejected bids for the 2025 maturity, data from the state debt office showed.
All 20 billion rupees of 15 September 2027 bonds were sold at 20 percent after calling bids for 20 billion.
None of the offered 15 billion rupees of 15 January 2025 bonds at 22.5 percent were sold. (Colombo/ Feb 27/2023)
